episodes.title: The Utopia That Almost Massacred 750 People in 1 Night
episodes.description:
What if I told you there was a Utopia that turned into a Terrifying and Dark Cult.

This is a true story about the infamous cult that is Rajneeshpuram.

We will be delving into the historical context, philosophy, and impact of this Cult. 


Sources
—————

https://news.uoregon.edu/rajneesh_collection

https://pdxscholar.library.pdx.edu/cgi/viewcontent.cgi?referer=&httpsredir=1&article=1121&context=usp_fac

Music from Suno AI and Epidemic Sound 


Note: The character Betty Olson is a fictional name based on a true story. I decided to keep the name anonymous as it was hard to fact check the story as there was countless cases like this. This doesn’t take away anything from the story, as it was the general account for all of the 750+ victims. 


This video took me 50+ hours to make. If you enjoyed it and want to support the channel, just subscribe, like, and share.
